subtitle.part2: of trucks, updated daily with vehicles from reliable and trusted sellers. Your perfect truck for the job is just a

heroSection.searchPlaceholder: Search by make, model, or truck type...

left.title: Selling Your Truck? TruckTrader Delivers!
left.description: Join our network and list your truck to reach thousands of buyers worldwide. Our platform is fast, easy, and effective, putting your truck in front of the right audience.

right.title: Explore Our Range of Commercial Vehicles
right.description: Discover hundreds of trucks from leading companies! Browse our extensive selection of vehicles from trusted brands, each chosen with your convenience in mind. Fine-tune your search to find the perfect match.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: At TruckTrader, we connect businesses with the commercial vehicles they need to drive success. Our platform is designed to facilitate seamless transactions between sellers and buyers in the commercial vehicle market, making it the go-to destination for B2B vehicle trading.
services.allBrandsDescription: We ensure your ads reach the right people, maximizing your exposure to potential buyers who are actively seeking commercial vehicles.
services.freeSupportDescription: Our pricing structure is designed to offer you the best value, making it affordable to list and sell your vehicles on our platform.
services.dealershipDescription: Need a tailored approach? We offer customized import feeds and flexible options to meet your specific business needs.
services.affordableDescription: We are committed to enhancing our platform with new features and are always open to recommendations from our users. Your feedback is invaluable in shaping the future of TruckTrader.

footer.description: Join TruckTrader today and experience the difference of a dedicated, flexible, and user-focused platform for commercial vehicle trading. Whether you're looking to sell your fleet or expand your operations with new vehicles, TruckTrader is here to support your business growth.

aboutHeader.title: About TruckTrader
aboutHeader.description: At TruckTrader, we connect businesses with the commercial vehicles they need to succeed. Our platform is built to streamline transactions between buyers and sellers in the commercial vehicle market, making it the ultimate destination for B2B vehicle trading.

userFriendly.title: Targeted Audience
userFriendly.description: We ensure your ads reach the right people, maximizing your visibility among buyers actively searching for commercial vehicles.

greatReach.title: Competitive Pricing
greatReach.description: Our pricing structure is designed to provide the best value, making it cost-effective to list and sell your vehicles.

cheapPlacement.title: Customized Solutions
cheapPlacement.description: Looking for a tailored approach? We offer custom import feeds and flexible options to suit your business needs.

highQuality.title: Continuous Improvement
highQuality.description: We’re constantly enhancing our platform with new features and value your input. Your feedback helps shape the future of TruckTrader.

readyMadeFeedsSection.title: There are currently connections with ready-made feeds at:
readyMadeFeedsSection.subtitle: Seamlessly integrate with our ready-made feeds, connecting you to multiple platforms instantly.

howDoWeGetStarted.title: Why Choose TruckTrader?
howDoWeGetStarted.subtitle: Enhance your brand visibility with our complimentary business directory.

step1.title: Instant Ad Visibility
step1.description: The moment your account is activated, your ads go live. No unnecessary delays—just immediate exposure to potential buyers looking for commercial vehicles.

step2.title: Fast & Reliable Network
step2.description: Our platform is powered by multiple data center locations, ensuring fast load times and a smooth experience for visitors, no matter where they are in the world.

step3.title: Ongoing Platform Enhancements
step3.description: We continuously improve our platform by adding new features and optimizing performance. Your feedback helps us shape a better experience for all users.

step4.title: Free Business Directory Listing
step4.description: Get maximum exposure with a free listing in our business directory. Increase your reach and make it easier for potential customers to find you.

xmlFeedSection.title: If no XML feed is available:

customFeeds.title: Custom In-House XML Feeds on Request
customFeeds.description: If not yet available, Trucktrader will create the XML feed for you in-house (based on a quotation).

webFeeds.title: XML Feeds by Your Web Administrator
webFeeds.description: You can have an XML feed developed by the administrator of your own website.

description.title: Descriptions
description.content: Compact and efficient, the 2019 Volvo Mini Truck offers a 3,500 kg payload, fuel-efficient diesel engine, and advanced safety features. Its ergonomic cab ensures comfort, making it ideal for urban deliveries.

swipper.title: Volvo Mini Truck 2019
swipper.description: Compact and efficient, the 2019 Volvo Mini Truck offers a 3,500 kg payload, fuel-efficient diesel engine, and advanced safety features.

contactHeader.title: Contact US
contactHeader.description: Have questions about buying, selling, or advertising with us? Our team is here to assist you with any inquiries or provide detailed support. Don’t hesitate to reach out—we’re just a message or call away.

header.title: Why Advertise on TruckTrader?
header.description: Looking to expand your reach and connect with serious buyers in the commercial vehicle market? TruckTrader has you covered.

carCompanies.title: Targeted Audience
carCompanies.description: At TruckTrader, we believe in keeping things simple. Our platform is built for hassle-free buying and selling of commercial vehicles. Advertise with us and reach an audience that's actively looking for the right vehicle.

individuals.title: High Visibility
individuals.description: With thousands of visitors each month, TruckTrader gives your listings outstanding exposure. Our platform is built to showcase your inventory in the best possible light, ensuring your trucks receive the attention they deserve.

directoryHeader.title: Put Your Business in the Spotlight!
directoryHeader.description: Showcase your brand to the right audience and take your business to new heights. With greater visibility and the perfect platform to connect with potential customers, you’ll stand out from the competition and make a lasting impression.

register.setupDescription: Choose your path and get started—register as an individual or a business to begin trading today
register.feature1: Explore thousands of trucks from top sellers and brands
register.feature2: Find exactly what you need—fast and easy
register.feature3: We prioritize your safety for worry-free trading
register.setupFooter: We’re here to help you get started the right way. Whether you’re an individual looking to buy or sell a truck for personal use, or a business aiming to manage multiple listings and grow your operations, select the option that best fits your needs and unlock the tools tailored to your goals.
